description: Spearheaded API automation for critical infrastructure services including VPCs, Kubernetes Services, Shared File Systems, and Compute Nodes.
Developed test suites using Swagger CLI and OpenAPI, ensuring consistent and developer-friendly documentation.
Led the testing efforts for internal services like Container Registry, GenAI model fine-tuning APIs, and OpenNebula orchestration layer.
Wrote and reviewed integration tests using Pytest for E2E SDKs, with a focus on modularity and maintainability.
Standardized API test structures and enforced code quality via internal code reviews and review checklists.
Collaborated with DevOps and Engineering teams to validate cloud-native features like node scaling, VM lifecycle management, and quota policies.
Created structured release notes summarizing feature changes, test coverage, and user-facing impacts.
Contributed to both manual and exploratory testing efforts for unreleased services and production hotfixes.
highlights: Designed reusable API test workflows that improved onboarding for new QA engineers.
Suggested improvements to automation logic and mock API integration, speeding up regression cycles.
Played a central role in aligning documentation and test coverage across product teams.

description: Built Django-based backend systems to integrate ad platforms like TikTok, LinkedIn, and Google Ads.
Developed campaign orchestration flows and metrics pipelines for real-time analytics.
Integrated Stripe for seamless payments and managed secure authentication workflows.
Delivered campaign reporting tools tailored for non-technical users.
highlights: Collaborated with Thirdi.ai, a high-profile client, and helped deploy production-ready code.
Built real-time campaign insights pipeline with minimal latency.
Improved ad ops usability by creating custom reporting tools for marketers.

description: Built 3 out of 5 AI-powered assistant bots for streamlining film production tasks using LLMs.
Developed REST APIs with Django and integrated them into Azure-hosted backend systems.
Implemented bots for compliance (legal rules), culture (local norms), and logistics (travel planning).
Worked across frontend/backend/AI teams and contributed to architecture and scalability improvements.
highlights: Boosted backend performance by 20% via optimized data handling and deployment strategy.
Delivered AI automation in a domain (film production) with complex operational workflows.
Successfully integrated real-time third-party APIs into multiple assistant bots.

description: Integrated LibreChat into Taccso's platform after studying its source code and documentation in depth.
Enabled model selection, document upload with retention, and semantic search within chat interface.
Configured backend logic to support file-based interactions with LLM agents in a production-grade setup.
highlights: Independently shipped the entire integration within a short one-month internship window.
Added major AI capabilities to an early-stage platform with minimal external support.
Expanded Taccso's product utility by enabling file-based contextual interactions with chatbots.
